title: In GOP Ad Wars, Trump Takes an Uncharacteristic Supporting Role
description: After wielding a bullhorn to shape Republican primaries, the former president has let other groups dominate the airwaves and cover the high cost of commercials.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump with Blake Masters, the Republican nominee for Senate in Arizona, whose campaign has been a beneficiary of Mr. Trumpâ€™s ad spending.
